enableWriteToDisk

public void enableWriteToDisk(boolean write)
If you call this method with true, every proxy that is created with the panel is stored to the default globus location. It probably makes sense to leave that (false) and manage the writing of the proxy on your own.

Parameters:
write - whether to write a created proxy to disk (true) or not (false -- default)
